articles.author: Luke Buckmaster
articles.title: From Strictly Ballroom to Elvis: the career of Baz Luhrmann – sorted - The Guardian
articles.description: The Australian auteur’s films are intoxicating, polarising spectacles – so from the very bad (Australia) to the very good, we rank his works across film and TV
articles.content: As we know from having had our senses pounded by various glitter-filled, hyperactive and blindingly bright spectacles, Baz Luhrmanns films dont talk they shout. The Sydney-born auteur practises a fil… [+8460 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Fact Check
articles.title: Fact Check-Photo of litter near Glastonbury's Pyramid Stage taken in 2015, not after Greta Thunberg's 2022 festival speech - Reuters.com
articles.description: A photo of litter strewn in front of Glastonbury’s Pyramid Stage was taken in 2015 and not after Greta Thunberg’s 2022 speech at the festival, contrary to claims online.
articles.content:
A photo of litter strewn in front of Glastonburys Pyramid Stage was taken in 2015 and not after Greta Thunbergs 2022 speech at the festival, contrary to claims online.
